title:
Conservation of the passband signal amplitude using a filter based on
  the Fast Fourier Transform algorithm
authors: Flavio Dalossa Freire and Isabel Gebauer Soares
abstract:
In this work, we propose an algorithm for a filter based on the Fast Fourier
Transform (FFT), which, due to its characteristics, allows for an efficient
computational implementation, ease of use, and minimizes amplitude variation in
the filtered signal. The algorithm was implemented using the programming
languages Python, R, and MATLAB. Initial results led to the conclusion that
there was less amplitude loss in the filtered signal compared to the FIR
filter. Future work may address a more rigorous methodology and comparative
assessment of computational cost.
